title: Migrate to Microservices Architecture
description: We have decided to migrate our monolithic application to a microservices architecture to improve scalability, enable independent deployments, and allow teams to work autonomously on different services.
assumptions: Team members have sufficient knowledge of containerization | Current infrastructure can support microservices overhead | Migration can be completed within 6 months

title: Implement AI-Powered Customer Support
description: Deploy an AI chatbot to handle tier-1 customer support inquiries, reducing response times and allowing human agents to focus on complex issues.
assumptions: AI can accurately handle 70% of incoming support tickets | Customers will be receptive to AI-powered support | Integration with existing CRM system will be straightforward

title: Expand to European Market
description: Launch operations in 5 European countries (Germany, France, UK, Spain, Italy) to diversify revenue streams and reduce dependency on the North American market.
assumptions: GDPR compliance can be achieved within current timeline | Market demand in Europe is comparable to North America | Local partnerships can be established within 3 months

title: Adopt Remote-First Work Policy
description: Transition to a permanent remote-first work model, closing physical offices except for small collaboration spaces.
assumptions: Productivity will remain stable or improve with remote work | Company culture can be maintained virtually | All employees have adequate home office setups

title: Invest in Cybersecurity Infrastructure
description: Allocate $5M to upgrade cybersecurity infrastructure including zero-trust architecture, advanced threat detection, and security training programs.
assumptions: Current vulnerabilities have been accurately identified | Budget allocation is sufficient for comprehensive upgrade | Implementation won't disrupt ongoing operations

title: Launch Mobile Application
description: Develop native mobile applications for iOS and Android to complement our web platform and capture mobile-first users.
assumptions: Mobile user base will grow by 200% after launch | Development can be completed within 9 months | App store approval process will be straightforward
